name: Himalayan Nepalese and Indian Restaurant
about: Himalayan Unique Cuisine Based On With Hint Of Orient. Our Rooted In Old-age Traditions That Takes You Beyond Your Expectations. Himalayan Preparatory Methods Include Core Traditional Nepalese Grilling Style Of Tandoori With Modern Concept To Extensive Experience. Himalayan Offer Sophisticated Nepalese & Indian Cuisine, Out Of The Ordinary And Sensationally Modern, fully licenced restaurant.
address: 62A Botanic Avenue, Belfast BT7 1JR, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom
